name: Kimbee
description: A speech therapy game for kids

scripts.install_android_cordova: cd kimbee_cordova && cordova platform add android && cd ..
scripts.run_android_cordova: cd kimbee_cordova && cordova build && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.android: rm -Rf kimbee_cordova && npm run-script install_cordova && npm run-script install_android_cordova && npm run-script cp_cordova && npm run-script run_android_cordova
scripts.serve: npm run-script make && cd src/ && python -m SimpleHTTPServer

author: Aaron Nech & Ryan Drapeau & Nick Huynh
